blood_pressure.target_message: Target set for patient with diabetes

guidelines.follow_up: Follow-up every 3 months, if there is no reduction in cardiovascular risk after six months of follow up refer to next level
guidelines.label: Medium

BP.message: Recommend to start first line antihypertensive for age > 55 with no allergies
BP.medication: Calcium Channel Blocker and/or thiazide diuretic

diet.target_message: Two serves of fruit and 5 serves of vegetables

diabetes.assessment_message: You are at risk of developing Diabetes
